text: David I'm fascinated by this notion of

basically becomes part of us a hand axe
I guess becomes an extension of our
limbs giving us extra power the car
becomes an extension of us giving us a

technologies are basically extensions of
our bodies I think one thing that's
really interesting about modern
technology is that it's increasingly

that used to be performed by my brains
like in remembering phone numbers I mean
who remembers a phone number where their

is serving as part of my navigation

so you know extending the mind is not
